episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 23 : What Happens When Sister Wives Turn into a Polygamous Mean Girl Gang?
episodes.description:
Forget “sister wife solidarity”. This is the real story behind the group of seven women who became a living nightmare for dozens of innocent co-wives.
In this explosive episode, Vera and Pamela expose the unfiltered truth of a vicious polygamist “friend group” who plotted to humiliate, emotionally destroy, and control their sister wives… all while sipping wine and quoting scripture.
From cutting power during intimate nights, to chili-rubbed underwear pranks, fake hickeys, public humiliation, spying through windows, gossip warfare, and even sabotaging birthdays and funerals, this was more than jealousy. It was a cult inside a cult.
They called them “The Thugs”, a sisterhood of butch-cut ring leaders and wannabe queens who weaponized friendship to gain clout and crush anyone who dared look happy.
This is polygamy like you’ve never heard it. Raw. Hilarious. Disturbing. And yes, somehow… still healing.
⚠️ Listener discretion advised: you will laugh, cringe, and maybe want to throw hands on behalf of these women.
🎙️ As always, no polygamists were harmed, or denied their celestial kingdom, in the making of this podcast… at least we hope not. 😉
Wicked Confessions Uncensored 
Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 22: A Day in the Life of a Polygamous Wife 👀 (It’s Not What You Think)
episodes.description:
What does a day in the life of a polygamous wife really look like? In this raw, hilarious, and totally unfiltered episode, we dive into the absurdity, routine, and emotional exhaustion of plural marriage: goat milking, nap-hopping husbands, weird food rules, and all. 🎭 From tracking your husband’s whereabouts by curtain positions to baking cakes from animal-grade sugar, this episode serves you the chaos of cult life with laughter and truth.
Plus, we talk about the not-so-secret "Telescope Club," wife-swapping in the colony, and how we’ve healed (and laughed) our way out of the madness. If you’ve ever wondered what it’s really like behind the veil of sister wife life, this one’s for you.
💥 Buckle up. It’s juicy, funny, heartbreaking, and liberating all at once. And no, no polygamists were harmed in the making of this podcast, at least we hope not. 😉

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 21: Can I Return My Husband? Asking for a Sister Wife.
episodes.description: If Costco has a return policy… why didn’t we? In this raw and ridiculously funny episode, Vera and Pamela take a wild ride through what it would’ve looked like if polygamy came with a refund policy. From “original parts only” to emotional wear and tear, they imagine what women could have claimed back after escaping a life of arranged marriages, control, and secondhand love. But behind the laughs are real stories of survival: 💔 Why they really left their marriages (hint: it wasn’t just the other wives) 🔁 How women were “returned” to their families like broken goods 🧠 The moment they realized they had lost their voices—and how they took them back 👩‍👧‍👦 And why the ultimate “return” was taking their kids and walking into freedom If you’ve ever felt like life didn’t come with a receipt, this one’s for you. Come for the jokes, stay for the healing. 👊 Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 20 - We Weren’t Supposed to Be Smart: Why Polygamy Fears Educated Women
episodes.description: From corn dog chaos in Cancun to reading National Geographic on the toilet just to feel educated… this episode is a wild ride through laughter, loss, sisterhood, and the sacred power of self-education. Vera and Pamela dive into what it was like growing up in a cult that discouraged education, valued obedience over knowledge, and saw smart women as a threat. They share raw stories of raising kids at 10, writing vocabulary lists by candlelight, and learning algebra with zero support, just determination. And it wouldn’t be Wicked Confessions without a little chaos: 🌭 A polygamist “tips” a wrestler with a corn dog in Mexico 📚 Teaching themselves to read, write, and spell without school 💔 Wondering if their mom would’ve judged them or cheered them on 🎭 Reclaiming power through humor, writing, and finally… freedom This episode is for every woman who was told to sit down, shut up, and stay sweet, but chose to rise instead. episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 19 - God’s Chosen… Thieves? The Shocking Secrets Behind Polygamy's Mansions & Mind Games
episodes.description: This episode is a full-on rollercoaster: hilarious childhood memories, shady construction site heists, cousin marriages, cult gossip, and a whole lot of “WTF?” From stolen drywall and hot water heaters to bulldozers, disability fraud, and tax evasion—Vera and Pamela expose the dark side of what some called “God’s work.” We’re talking about how a polygamous cult justified stealing, hoarding food during shortages, ignoring quarantine orders during a measles outbreak, and marrying their cousins… all while judging the ones who walked away. And then there’s the flip side—how two little girls dared to leave that world behind, built empires, and found freedom without ever becoming bitter or broken. 💥 You’ll laugh. You’ll gasp. You’ll probably rewind. 🎧 Buckle up, babe. This one’s wild. Wicked Confessions Uncensored Website | Tiktok | Facebook | Instagram | Email

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 18 - The Inner Circle: Panties, Pranks & Pain Inside Polygamy
episodes.description: What happens when jealousy, religion, and 13 wives mix in one house? You get stories you’ll never forget—and probably shouldn’t repeat in church. This episode of Wicked Confessions Uncensored dives into the raw, real, and sometimes ridiculous moments that shaped our lives inside a polygamous cult. From prank wars involving lingerie and titty twists (yes, seriously), to silent rivalries, lost babies in jars, and cousin-married-to-cousin drama—this is the messy, emotional, and painfully human reality behind the “sacred order.” But it’s not just about shock value. episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 17 - Twisters, Stolen Panties & the Real Sister Wives of Polygamy
episodes.description:
Forget everything you’ve seen on reality TV. These are the uncensored confessions from women who actually lived the chaos of polygamy—and we’re not holding back.
In this jaw-dropping episode, we spill stories too wild for prime time:
 👙 A literal fight ends in a “boob twist” revenge move.
 🩲 Lingerie gets stolen and displayed like trophies.
 🚗 One wife rams her husband’s truck over a stolen “date day.”
 🍼 A miscarried baby ends up in a jar... and the mother finds it.
 👨‍👩‍👧 Cousins marry cousins until nobody can tell who’s related anymore.

Between the jokes and jaw drops, we also ask the hard questions: Why did we stay? What did we believe? How did we finally break free?
Because this isn’t just about the drama—it’s about freedom, self-trust, and silencing the inner bitch that told us to keep sweet and stay small.

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 16 - The Mystery Box, the Lesbian Marine & the Celestial Plot Twist
episodes.description:
What do you get when you mix a box of secrets, a Marine-turned-polygamist, and a dildo that sparks way too many questions?
In this wild ride of an episode, we share the untold story of Betty—once a bold, lesbian Marine who traded her love, freedom, and identity for a life of celestial marriage in a polygamous cult. From playing strip poker in the military to burning tortillas in a communal kitchen, to unexpectedly raising five sister wives’ kids, her story is one of sacrifice, survival, and secretly holding on to the love of her life.
But it doesn’t stop there. After her husband—a man of “God” and strict morals—passes away, a mysterious box is found. And let’s just say… it raises more questions than answers. What was it for? Who did it belong to? And how many other secrets get buried in the name of righteousness?
This episode is hilarious, heartbreaking, and deeply human. Because behind every “righteous” rule is a real person with real feelings, secrets, and choices no one ever dared to ask about.
🎧 Listen in as we unpack the myths, the mess, and the mystery.

episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 15 - The STD, the Secrets, and the Six-Month Rule: How Polygamy Broke Her Heart
episodes.description: This story is one for the books—scandal, betrayal, double standards, and a whole lot of “WTF?!” When a faithful wife ends up with an STD, her world shatters. The worst part? She got it from the one man she trusted—the husband she married as a virgin. In this unfiltered episode, we dive deep into what really happens behind closed doors in polygamous marriages, and how cult loyalty often forces women to stay… even when their health, dignity, and hearts are on the line. We talk about: STDs being quietly spread in “God’s name” The six-month “divorce rule” the church uses Why women get shamed for doing what men get forgiven for Midwives, marriage contracts, family “counseling,” and the shame cycle How abuse is repackaged as “spiritual growth” And yes, we even unpack the infamous tea-drugging story 🤯 💔 If you’ve ever wondered how women are kept silent, submissive, and stuck—this episode is the uncomfortable, honest truth they never want told. episodes.title: Wicked Confessions Uncensored Episode 14 - The Prophet, the Prank, and the Power Trip: Why We Stopped Believing
episodes.description: What happens when your childhood “prophet” is treated as more powerful than Jesus—and his grandson thinks he’s the next chosen one… because of a prank? In this episode, we dig into the absurdity and intensity of cult-level religious belief. We talk about growing up hearing that the prophet’s word was God’s word, how people still wait for him to return from the dead, and how this false authority created a culture of control, fear, and entitlement. Then we lighten it up with the infamous “Peter Please” story—a prank that convinced the prophet’s grandson he was the next holy leader. It’s a wild, hilarious ride through how belief systems shape (and sometimes warp) people’s identities, even generations later. We also reflect on the real price of leaving a system built on fear—losing friends, community, and sometimes family—but gaining something priceless: freedom and self-worth. 🎧 If you've ever been told to never question authority… this one’s for you. episodes.description:
This episode might be one of our most unfiltered yet.
From watching my sister wife hang my husband's underwear on her fence...
 To dyeing her wedding dress purple out of pure emotional chaos (thanks, inner critic)...

We take you through the jealousy, the trauma, the guilt, the laughter—and the honest-to-God absurdity of polygamous life. It wasn’t just weddings and baby blessings—it was hierarchy, rivalry, emotional gymnastics, and pretending everything was “God’s will” while your soul was screaming hell no.
And yes, we’re naming the voice in our heads—the inner bitch—that told us we were being “worldly” or “jealous” for having normal human reactions to a deeply abnormal situation.

In this raw and emotional episode, we recount the tragic story of our sister Donna’s final night, the devastating polygamous dynamics leading up to it, and the silent suffering so many women endure in the name of “God’s law.”

In this explosive episode, we expose the hypocrisy, shame cycles, and double standards that haunted the polygamous cult we grew up in.
